name: Love in Login
storyline:
Sung-hyun, a business manager in a game company, waits for the an illustration contest winner to make a contract.
That was the day when Sung-hyun met Da-hye.
After making the contract, the rain starts to intensify.
Sunghyun puts an umbrella on Da-hye and takes her home, only to find out that Da-hye's house is flooded.
Without choice, he takes her to his home...

"An online friend I've been known for 8 years is actually a hot girl?
Your ID's Jerklord. I thought you were a dude!!!"
summary: Met the girl who is my game buddy in real life.
